title: Kane
description: He’s the player with the most to lose…Team captain.Hot as puck.Ego the size of his stick.…And Tyler Kane has something to hide.Kennedy Lockwood is a sports reporter who knows Tyler’s secret.She’s desperate for the full story that can save her failing newspaper.And Tyler will do anything to keep his troubled past buried.So, they make a deal, one that changes both of their lives.
author: Jillian  Quinn
